None.Name: Blessed Taming
None.Description: Activate to tame friendly demon and undead.Every Demon or Undead within a 20 m around Eliminator will then be able to focus better on defending: they take 30% less damage but also lose 10 life points per second. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
